fields.description:
*User Story*

As a whitelabel client,

I want to add a ‘Regulation’ column fields across Admin Portal

So that it can help Treasury to help identify whether clients are ASIC or VFSC.





*Acceptance Criteria*

# *In Whitelabel (BBM and SynergyMarkets) LogixPanel Admin Portal → Trader Management →*{color:#00b8d9} {color}{color:#36b37e}*Individual Account*{color}*.*
## Add a ‘Regulation’ column field - between ‘Account Type’ and ‘Source’ fields.
!IndividualAccount.png|width=53.205128205128204%!
## Map and sync the ‘Regulation’ field from Individual/Corporate trader profile page.
!Regulation34234324.PNG|width=53.205128205128204%!
## Mass update the ‘Regulation’ field across all accounts.
# *In Whitelabel (BBM and SynergyMarkets) LogixPanel Admin Portal → Trader Management →* {color:#36b37e}*Corporate Account*{color}*.*
## Add a ‘Regulation’ column field - between ‘Account Type’ and ‘Source’ fields.
!CorporateAccount.png|width=53.205128205128204%!
## Map and sync the ‘Regulation’ field from Individual/Corporate trader profile page.
!Regulation34234324.PNG|width=53.205128205128204%!
## Mass update the ‘Regulation’ field across all accounts.
# *In Whitelabel (BBM and SynergyMarkets) LogixPanel Admin Portal → Treasury →* {color:#36b37e}*Deposits*{color}*.*
## Add a ‘Regulation’ column field - between ‘Date’ and ‘Name’ fields.
!Deposits (1).png|width=53.205128205128204%!
### Map and sync the ‘Regulation’ field from Individual/Corporate trader profile page.
!Regulation34234324.PNG|width=50.641025641025635%!
### Mass update the ‘Regulation’ field across all records.
### When the user executes ‘Advanced Search’ then 'Export:
!Deposits_ExportFunction.png|width=50.641025641025635%!
###* In the Excel (xls) file, add a ‘Regulation’ column field. - between ‘Log#’ and ‘MT#’ fields.
!Deposits_Export_Excel.png|width=56.41025641025641%!
## {color:#00b8d9}Add a ‘Trading Platform’ column field - between ‘MT#’ and ‘Submitted Deposit’ fields. {color}{color:#00b8d9}*(New AC, as of 20 December 2022)*{color}
!Deposits_ExportFunction_TradingPlatformColumnField.png|width=53.205128205128204%!
### {color:#00b8d9}For Tooltip: MT trading account platform (MT4/MT5){color}
### {color:#00b8d9}Map and sync the ‘Trading Platform’ field based on the MT# trading account platform. The values are either:{color}
#### {color:#00b8d9}MetaTrader 4{color}
#### {color:#00b8d9}MetaTrader 5{color}
### {color:#00b8d9}Mass update the ‘Trading Platform’ field across all records.{color}
### {color:#00b8d9}When the user executes ‘Advanced Search’ then 'Export:{color}
###* {color:#00b8d9}In the Excel (xls) file, add a ‘Trading Platform’ column field. - between ‘MT#’ and ‘Name’ fields.{color}
!Deposits_Export_Excel_TradingPlatform.png|width=56.41025641025641%!
# *In Whitelabel (BBM and SynergyMarkets) LogixPanel Admin Portal → Treasury →* {color:#36b37e}*Withdrawals*{color}*.*
## Add a ‘Regulation’ column field - between ‘Date’ and ‘Name’ fields.
!Withdrawals.png|width=53.205128205128204%!
### Map and sync the ‘Regulation’ field from Individual/Corporate trader profile page.
!Regulation34234324.PNG|width=50.641025641025635%!
### Mass update the ‘Regulation’ field across all records.
### When the user executes ‘Advanced Search’ then 'Export:
!Withdrawals_ExportFunction.png|width=50.641025641025635%!
###* In the Excel (xls) file, add a ‘Regulation’ column field. - between ‘Log#’ and ‘MT#’ fields.
!Withdrawals_Export_Excel (1).png|width=56.41025641025641%!
## {color:#00b8d9}Add a ‘Trading Platform’ column field - between ‘MT#’ and ‘Submitted Deposit’ fields. {color}{color:#00b8d9}*(New AC, as of 20 December 2022)*{color}
!Withdrawals_ExportFunction_TradingPlatformColumnField.png|width=1920,height=968!
### {color:#00b8d9}For Tooltip: MT trading account platform (MT4/MT5){color}
### {color:#00b8d9}Map and sync the ‘Trading Platform’ field based on the MT# trading account platform. The values are either:{color}
#### {color:#00b8d9}MetaTrader 4{color}
#### {color:#00b8d9}MetaTrader 5{color}
### {color:#00b8d9}Mass update the ‘Trading Platform’ field across all records.{color}
### {color:#00b8d9}When the user executes ‘Advanced Search’ then 'Export:{color}
###* {color:#00b8d9}In the Excel (xls) file, add a ‘Trading Platform’ column field. - between ‘MT#’ and ‘Name’ fields.{color}
!Withdrawals_Export_Excel_TradingPlatform.png|width=1920,height=1040!
# Apply across all environments.

comments.body: [Eason  Wong|https://gitlab.com/EasonWong] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/merge_requests/2028] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / cloudhub|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub] on branch [LP1-3574|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/tree/LP1-3574]:{quote}<LP1-3574> Implement 'Regulation' fields across Admin Portal.{quote}

Hi [~accountid:6191bb4debce47006794773d] [~accountid:62538eb7cdc240007049cc33] [~accountid:63351855140ba0bf651c116d], Ginny has advised for another requirement, which is to also add “Trading Platform” column field in Deposits (including Export) and Withdrawals (including Export). I have highlighted the new ACs in blue under the story’s description. Thank you.

[Eason  Wong|https://gitlab.com/EasonWong] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/merge_requests/2030] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / cloudhub|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub] on branch [LP1-3574|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/tree/LP1-3574]:{quote}<LP1-3574> add the field of platform on Deposit/Withdraw/ExportExcel.{quote}

[Eason  Wong|https://gitlab.com/EasonWong] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/merge_requests/2031] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / cloudhub|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub] on branch [LP1-3574|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/tree/LP1-3574]:{quote}<LP1-3574> update the tooltip for the field of platform{quote}

QA has completed the manual testing, go to UAT and assign to [~accountid:626f28307de1ec00695822e5]. Thx!

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a system,

I want to update the Chinese Simplified emails to have the new ACY “12 years” design for footer and header

So that we have consistent design with ACY website.





*Acceptance Criteria*

# In both LogixPanel *ACY LTD and AU*, all the Chinese Simplified emails that are not listed or displayed (hardcoded) should be updated with the new footer and header.
## Copy the new source code from Admin Portal LTD test env. 
## Copy the old content from old template to the new email template.
!345345 (6).png|width=764,height=1196!
# Apply to both ACY LTD and AU environments.
# Conduct testing for the following ([~accountid:626f28307de1ec00695822e5] will provide steps for trigger) - 5 emails
fields.summary: [LogixPanel] Update Chinese Simplified emails to have the new ACY "12 years" design for footer and header

comments.body:
After my research, there is no hardcoded email template.
We can just update all email templates through the admin portal.

Based on [~accountid:62538eb7cdc240007049cc33] research and comments, no hardcoded email templates. All the active ones can be updated through the Admin Portal. This story is considered ‘Done’. FYI [~accountid:61d4f155326554006c015f63]

fields.summary: [OPS-1039] - Activate Chinese Traditional emails from LogixPanel Admin Portal LTD & AU

issuetype.description: A small piece of work that's part of a larger task.
issuetype.name: Sub-task

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a system,

I want to update and refactor of activating emails

So that I can activate emails more efficiently in LogixPanel.

{color:#ff5630}*Note:*{color}{color:#ff5630} This story is to follow up the OPS ticket {color}[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2885|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2885|smart-link], {color:#ff5630}which also includes activating Chinese Traditionally emails.{color}





*Background*

* In LogixPanel Admin Portal LTD & AU → Email Manager → General Email → Chinese Traditional section:
** As of Tuesday 29 September 2022, all the Chinese Traditional emails have been recently created and translated into Chinese Traditional by our colleagues (Sia Tu and Amber Ho), and have not been activated in backend for use.
* Due to the further release of Chinese Traditional language for ACY, we will need to activate these emails from backend in order to send them to clients whose country (Hong Kong, Taiwan, etc) has Chinese Traditional language.
* Furthermore, our Marketing team would like to get these emails tested out as upon Jimmy’s request.





*Current Investigation into email logics and outcome moving forward*

On 13 October 2022, [~accountid:61d4f155326554006c015f63] checked with [~accountid:6191bb4debce47006794773d] in regards to the feedback of activating emails from LogixPanel. There are two (2) parts that need to be updated to make this work - Client (api_cloudhub_panel) and Admin (cloudhub). There are a total of 20 templates, the latest code submitted for Client works for 5 templates, the other 15 templates on Admin still need to be coded. After investigation on Admin code, the template id logic and country logic are messy, and they are all hardcoded. To hardcode these it will take 1.5 man day, but for long term fix and refactor, it will take 3 man day.





*Reference*

[https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2885|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2885|smart-link]





*Acceptance Criteria*

# Update and refactor of activating emails from LogixPanel. [~accountid:6191bb4debce47006794773d] to provide information.
# In *LogixPanel Admin Portal ACY LTD* → Email Manager → General Email → Chinese Traditional section:
## Activate The *Chinese Traditional emails*, as {color:#36b37e}*highlighted in green*{color} within the screenshot below, should be activated in backend in order to send these emails to clients whose country (Hong Kong, Taiwan, etc) has Traditional Chinese language.
!LP_Admin_ChineseTraditionalEmail_LTD.png|width=2559,height=1371!
### *Note:* The Chinese Traditional email templates were copied over from all the active Chinese Simplified email templates, the Chinese Traditional emails should have trigger logics similar to Chinese Simplified emails, but would be sent to clients whose country (Hong Kong, Taiwan, etc) has Traditional Chinese language. {color:#ff5630}As these email templates were made awhile back, please keep in mind that some of the Chinese Traditional emails might not need to be activated. Therefore it should be cross reference with Chinese Simplified emails that are currently active.{color}
# In *LogixPanel Admin Portal ACY AU* → Email Manager → General Email → Chinese Traditional section:
## Activate The *Chinese Traditional emails*, as {color:#36b37e}*highlighted in green*{color} within the screenshot below, should be activated in backend in order to send these emails to clients whose country (Hong Kong, Taiwan, etc) has Traditional Chinese language.
!LP_Admin_ChineseTraditionalEmail_AU.png|width=2559,height=1371!
### *Note:* The Chinese Traditional email templates were copied over from all the active Chinese Simplified email templates, the Chinese Traditional emails should have trigger logics similar to Chinese Simplified emails, but would be sent to clients whose country (Hong Kong, Taiwan, etc) has Traditional Chinese language. {color:#ff5630}As these email templates were made awhile back, please keep in mind that some of the Chinese Traditional emails might not need to be activated. Therefore it should be cross reference with Chinese Simplified emails that are currently active.{color}
# Conduct QA testing by triggering some emails from both ACY LTD and AU environments. {color:#ff5630}*Note:* {color}{color:#ff5630}BE to advise which ones are supposed to be activated (as mentioned above, refer to Chinese Simplified emails as well){color}.






|*Name*|*Trigger*|
|ACY帳號管理系統登入資訊|Admin : when updating the password of trader.|
|ACY證券 - 出金申請|Client : when applying for the deposit.|
|ACY證券 - 入金申請|Client : when applying for the withdrawal.|
|ACY證券 - 交易平台帳號密碼重設|Admin : when reseting the password of account & mam account.
Client : when reseting the password of account.|
|ACY證券 - 合作夥伴申請|Client : when applying for the affiliate.|
|ACY證券 - 收到子帳戶申請|Client : when applying for the sub account.|
|ACY證券 - 收到諮詢|Not found.|
|ACY證券 - 銀行帳單通過審核|Admin : when approving the request of bank account.|
|ACY證券 - 銀行帳單審核不通過|Admin : when rejecting the request of bank account.|
|缺少ID證明|Admin : when rejecting the request of trader, it will display the button to send the email under the block of the upload file.|
|缺少地址證明|Admin : when rejecting the request of trader, it will display the button to send the email under the block of the upload file.|
|合作夥伴申請拒絕|Admin : when rejecting the request of agent.|
|忘記密碼|Client : when clicking the button of reset password.|
|ACY證券 - 諮詢回覆|Admin : when replying the ticket.|
|ACY證券 - 出金申請撤銷|Admin : when rejecting the request of withdrawal.|
|ACY證券 - 出金申請執行|Admin : when approving the request of withdrawal.|
|Affiliate 有效客戶等級| |
|Affiliate交易量等級獎勵領取| |
|代理號有新客戶開戶| |
|成功註冊參加2022點差獵人交易大賽 – 賽事啟程！|Client : when applying the TradingCUP.|

comments.body: Hi [~accountid:6191bb4debce47006794773d] [~accountid:62257aee94f7e20069003aa9] marketing team has updated the header and footer to “12 years” banners for these emails in prod. Please keep that in mind when we activate them. Thank you!

[Eason  Wong|https://gitlab.com/EasonWong] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel/-/merge_requests/1256] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / api_cloudhub_panel|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel] on branch [LP1-3448|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel/-/tree/LP1-3448]:{quote}<LP1-3448> update the logic for EmailCountry and EmailTrigger.{quote}

There are some points be found while conducting the test. After discussing with [~accountid:6191bb4debce47006794773d] , it’s better to leave the comments below to document.

# The triggers for both “ACY證券 - 出金申請執行 “ and “ACY證券 - 出金申請撤銷“ are pressing the “Sent“ button under “Email“ column after approving/ rejecting the withdraw application on the Withdrawals page.

!image-20230103-062852.png|width=1731,height=1014!

2. The deposit/ withdraw application email provided by Marketing team need to be confirm. There’re unexpected blank in the email content and the one for ticket reply has no content.

||*Deposit*||*Withdraw*||*Ticket Reply*||
|!image-20230103-063356.png|width=1081,height=881!|!image-20230103-063432.png|width=973,height=798!|!image-20230104-081242.png|width=908,height=810!|
|!image-20230103-063215.png|width=1431,height=1587!|!image-20230103-063242.png|width=1427,height=1556!|!image-20230104-081303.png|width=742,height=896!|

[Eason  Wong|https://gitlab.com/EasonWong] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel/-/merge_requests/1260] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / api_cloudhub_panel|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel] on branch [LP1-3448|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/api_cloudhub_panel/-/tree/LP1-3448]:{quote}<LP1-3448> refactor the method of reply email.{quote}

[Eason  Wong|https://gitlab.com/EasonWong] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/merge_requests/2061] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / cloudhub|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub] on branch [LP1-3448|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/tree/LP1-3448]:{quote}<LP1-3448> refactor the page of agent approve.{quote}

[Eason  Wong|https://gitlab.com/EasonWong] mentioned this issue in [a merge request|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/merge_requests/2063] of [Zerologix / LogixPanel / cloudhub|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub] on branch [LP1-3448|https://gitlab.com/zerologix/logixpanel/cloudhub/-/tree/LP1-3448]:{quote}<LP1-3448> update the response of EmailMissingID and EmailMissingAddress{quote}

QA has conducted all the tests and it can be moved on to [~accountid:626f28307de1ec00695822e5] to do the UAT🙌 


[^LP1-3448-[LogixPanel] Update_refactor of activating emails (includes activating Chinese Traditional emails).pdf]

Conducted UAT with new “12 years” email templates. {color:#36b37e}*PASSED*{color} result. As for any unusual format and content, the marketing team can help make amendments to those ones. The status has been changed to ‘Done’. Thank you team! [~accountid:6191bb4debce47006794773d] [~accountid:62257aee94f7e20069003aa9] [~accountid:61d4f155326554006c015f63]

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a system,

I want penetration test to be conducted on LogixCRM

So that we can fix and improve security of this system.





*Acceptance Criteria*

# Execute OWASP to scan the 'LogixCRM' and generate the Test Report
# All the pages and interactive elements display on the 'LogixCRM' ([https://zerologix.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/LP/pages/133333095/Logix+Panel+CRM+-+Penetration+Test+Plan)|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/LP/pages/133333095/Logix+Panel+CRM+-+Penetration+Test+Plan)|smart-link]
# For 'High' or critical risks, QA and Dev to review and create issues.
 For 'Medium' risks, they can be reviewed and followed up later.
fields.summary: [LogixCRM] Penetration Test
[QA] Read document for [LogixCRM] Penetration Test

fields.summary: S3 file move execution on production environment (AU, LTD)

issuetype.description: A small, distinct piece of work.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description:
*User Story*

As a team,

We want to execute the release plan for file moving (refer to [https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2739|https://zerologix.atlassian.net/browse/LP1-2739|smart-link])

So that we can improve our file security.





*Acceptance Criteria*

* BE Dev to schedule file move release with Devops.
* BE Dev to support Devops in executing the file move workflow as per release plan. 
* PMO to verify that all files are moved to the new destinated location, and resources are displayed correctly on both Admin + Client portal.
fields.summary: [File Move] Execute the file move release plan
[QA] Verify release plan
